title: mxfwzzwizqbz
author: mxfwzzwizqbz
content: Is there a way to delete my account? or at least remove any traces of my username

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: No. Just change the password and forget that password. Remove any email address attached on that account. There's no other way to delete the account. Create a new account, don't use this account anymore. It pretty much serves the same object as you are looking for.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Well, if the deletion of the account is because of that username, or you by chance use your real name or whoever in that username, you can request to admin @Cyrus to change your name for privacy reasons and etc. I knew some users here was approved to change their username by that reason.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Lol, looks like the sugar outburst just turned off, now he is deleting his posts and requesting for account deletion. A friendly advice Micha? Don't be afraid you are not in any immediate danger, just PM admin and relax, they will do what is necessary.

comments.author: MusaMohamed
comments.body: Quote from: hilariousandco on March 04, 2018, 11:06:22 AMIt's not possible. Just abandon it. Abandon itorYou canChange your account password to random passwordChange your email to a random oneLog outYour account will no longer be accessible by you.

comments.author: hilariousandco
comments.body: An admin can fully delete it but if you're worried about privacy etc it's best not to create another account with a similar username and then announce it as it just ties the two together anyway.

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: Quote from: mxfwzzwizqbz on February 20, 2023, 08:03:49 AMIs there a way to delete my account? or at least remove any traces of my username Why should you have this concern in mind, have you experience any discomfort with that, though i don't think there's a function to do that but you can always Logout your account and delete the browser used as well and clear the cookies and caches, this is the best and easy way to stay off the forum incase you choose to, but on a rare condition I've come across this kind of experience whereby people want this same request you required, but it's something you can always do, you have the right to choose the site and things you do whenever you're connected to the internet, deleting account by self may not be possible but you can remain inactive and the account remains like that which took nothing away from you either.
